definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Then the eye is relaxed for distance and the entire amount of focusing ability is available to see close.
sentences.chinese: 远视的眼睛得以松弛，用全部调焦能力近看。

sentences.english: The second version also has wider and deeper knurling on the focusing ring than the previous version.
sentences.chinese: 第二版调焦环上的棱比前一版更宽更深。

sentences.english: First, learn how to focus the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 首先，学习显微镜如何调焦。

sentences.english: Aim\ To realize automatic height measurement and focusing of aerial photographic camera.
sentences.chinese: 目的实现航空像机摄影高度自动测量和调焦。

sentences.english: It is reviewed in this paper auto-focus which is one of the key technologies in infrared micron-spot scanner.
sentences.chinese: 自动调焦是红外小光点扫描测试仪关键技术之一。

sentences.english: There's also a power button, shutter release, and zoom slider up top -- all pretty standard stuff.
sentences.chinese: 顶部上有一个电源按键，快门按键，镜头远近调焦键。
一个滑动的按钮可以调焦。

sentences.english: Position camera on tripod and prefocus on inside of tank.
sentences.chinese: 把相机固定于三脚架，预先对水缸内部调焦。

sentences.english: Direct push-rod revolving locking mechanism, the adjustment of focus is quick and easy.
sentences.chinese: 采用直拉推杆旋转锁紧结构调焦。

sentences.english: A kind of real time & dynamic control algorithm on field by field. focusing and leveling of high accuracy is presented.
sentences.chinese: 主要介绍一种高精度逐场调焦调平实时动态控制算法。

sentences.english: It wants to be relaxed for distance, with the ciliary muscle contracting only for brief periods of close focusing.
sentences.chinese: 只有由睫状肌收缩，短暂的近调焦使远距离得到松弛。

sentences.english: This means that less focusing effort is needed.
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着需要减少调焦。

sentences.english: Each eight-hour battery charge allows for two-to-three days of switching between focus settings.
sentences.chinese: 每次充电8小时可以转换调焦设置两到三天。

sentences.english: This film forgives errors in focusing.
sentences.chinese: 这种胶片容许调焦误差。

sentences.english: As the photographer focuses his apparatus a woman joins the group.
sentences.chinese: 正当摄影师调焦之时，一位女士出现了。

sentences.english: Based previous tasks, work out the software of autofocusing system implement.
sentences.chinese: 在前续课题的基础上，编制了自动调焦系统应用软件。

definition: rectangular frame used to view a scene (made out of cardboard etc, or formed by the thumbs and forefingers)/viewfinder/viewing frame
